entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
